name: BitmapTextLayoutData
description: The layout data for a bitmap text. This contains the width, height, scale, offsetY and lines of text. Each line contains its width, character positions, characters, space width and spaces index.

properties.name: lines
chars
spaceWord
properties.type:
false,
        width: 0,
        start: 0,
        index: 0, // use index to not modify the array as we use it a lot!
        positions: [] as number[],
        chars: [] as string[],
    }
